CIF.Text: CIF, 2002, c. 9, s. 1, Part 2 (ss. 5 to 10), Part 4 (ss. 20 to 44), s. 46 and Part 6 (s. 47) in force on assent 27.03.2002; Part 1 (ss. 2 and 3) in force 01.04.2002 see SI/2002-63; Part 3 (ss. 12 to 18) in force 17.04.2002 see SI/2002-76; ss. 1 and 2 of An Act to establish a program to provide contributions for the economic and social development of Africa in fulfilment of the objectives set out in the New Partnership for Africa’s Development, as enacted by s. 45 in force 12.04.2002 see SI/2002-71; ss. 3 to 5 of the Canada Fund for Africa Act, as enacted by s. 45, in force 27.06.2002 see SI/2002-101
CIF, 2024, c. 15, s. 340 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 341(2) — Not in force
